personal.name: SOCIAL LIFE AGENT
personal.description: Track and remind about social connections. Read personal contact list, send call reminder, draft follow-up email

personal.name: HEALTH TRACKER
personal.description: Track personal improvement goals (BMI, habits). Capture progress in Google Sheet, set calendar reminder, draft progress email

personal.name: SMART SHOPPER
personal.description: Help find deals for gadgets, clothes, etc. Extract shopping items from transcript, return top 3 deals with comparison

personal.name: MOOD INSIGHT
personal.description: Log and trend emotional state. Detect mood, suggest content to improve motivation, email summary

personal.name: COORDINATOR
personal.description: Summarize all agent tasks into a daily log. Aggregate outputs, compile report, send final email

work.name: CLIENT INTEL
work.description: Extract requirements from client conversations. Parse client transcript, extract objectives, pain points, and goals

work.name: PROPOSAL DRAFTER
work.description: Generate proposal (objectives, challenges, solution). Use extracted insights to draft structured proposals with 3 key sections

work.name: MEETING SUMMARIZER
work.description: Summarize meeting/diary notes. Summarize main topics, action items, and outcomes from meetings or notes

work.name: ACTION EXECUTOR
work.description: Execute tasks and manage workflows. Automate repetitive tasks, manage deadlines, and coordinate team efforts
